plot: Trapped in a dingy basement by shambling zombies, three disgruntled co-workers try to devise a scheme to get past the living dead lurking outside their door. When brains and brawn fail, it's up to useless movie trivia to save the day.
title: Everything I Needed to Know About Zombies I Learned from the Movies
plot_es: Trapped in a dingy basement by shambling zombies, three disgruntled co-workers try to devise a scheme to get past the living dead lurking outside their door. When brains and brawn fail, it's up to useless movie trivia to save the day.
original_name: Everything I Needed to Know About Zombies I Learned from the Movies
plot_en: Trapped in a dingy basement by shambling zombies, three disgruntled co-workers try to devise a scheme to get past the living dead lurking outside their door. When brains and brawn fail, it's up to useless movie trivia to save the day.
